_header: At Shoteres Hill in the shire of Kent
_description: Shoteres Hill in Kent as a resort of thieves — one monorhyming quatrain

GULHun232.Transcription:
At shoteres hyll in the shyre of kentwhen theves have theyr monye
                    spentfast thether they resort with a full ententof true men ther to
                    have som lent
GULHun232.Note:
Added by a later hand (fifteenth-sixteenth century) to lower
                    margin.
